description: Image Base64 rendering Tag helper. Put img asp-render-base64='true' and in the _ViewImports @addTagHelper *, AspNetCore.Mvc.ImageBase64
title: AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.Extensions

packOptions.summary: First Release for render base 64 images directly in browser .Use @addTagHelper *, AspNetCore.Mvc.ImageBase64 and  <img asp-render-base64='true'. See https://github.com/ignatandrei/AspNetCoreImageTagHelper  for more details.
packOptions.releaseNotes: First Release for render base 64 images directly in browser .Use @addTagHelper *, AspNetCore.Mvc.ImageBase64 and  <img asp-render-base64='true'. See https://github.com/ignatandrei/AspNetCoreImageTagHelper  for more details.
